articles.title: Sourav Ganguly Moves Bombay High Court For Enforcement Of 2018 Arbitration Award - NDTV Sports
articles.description: BCCI president and former India captain Sourav Ganguly moved Bombay High Court seeking enforcement of a 2018 arbitration tribunal order that awarded him compensation payable by his former management companies.
